sn12.63:1.2: “cattarome, bhikkhave, ahara bhutanam va sattanam thitiya sambhavesinam va anuggahaya.
sn12.63:1.4: Kabalikaro aharo olariko va sukhumo va, phasso dutiyo, manosancetana tatiya, vinnanam catuttham.
sn12.63:1.5: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattaro ahara bhutanam va sattanam thitiya sambhavesinam va anuggahaya.
sn12.63:2.2: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, dve jayampatika parittam sambalam adaya kantaramaggam patipajjeyyum.
sn12.63:2.4: Atha kho tesam, bhikkhave, dvinnam jayampatikanam kantaragatanam ya paritta sambalamatta, sa parikkhayam pariyadanam gaccheyya.
sn12.63:2.6: Atha kho tesam, bhikkhave, dvinnam jayampatikanam evamassa:
sn12.63:2.7: ‘amhakam kho ya paritta sambalamatta sa parikkhina pariyadinna.
sn12.63:2.9: Yannuna mayam imam ekaputtakam piyam manapam vadhitva valluranca sondikanca karitva puttamamsani khadanta evam tam kantaravasesam nitthareyyama, ma sabbeva tayo vinassimha’ti.
sn12.63:2.10: Atha kho te, bhikkhave, dve jayampatika tam ekaputtakam piyam manapam vadhitva valluranca sondikanca karitva puttamamsani khadanta evam tam kantaravasesam nitthareyyum.
sn12.63:2.11: Te puttamamsani ceva khadeyyum, ure ca patipiseyyum:
sn12.63:3.2: api nu te davaya va aharam ahareyyum, madaya va aharam ahareyyum, mandanaya va aharam ahareyyum, vibhusanaya va aharam ahareyyun”ti?
sn12.63:3.4: “Nanu te, bhikkhave, yavadeva kantarassa nittharanatthaya aharam ahareyyun”ti?
sn12.63:3.6: “‘Evameva khvaham, bhikkhave, kabalikaro aharo datthabbo’ti vadami.
sn12.63:3.7: Kabalikare, bhikkhave, ahare parinnate panca kamaguniko rago parinnato hoti.
sn12.63:3.8: Panca kamagunike rage parinnate natthi tam samyojanam yena samyojanena samyutto ariyasavako puna imam lokam agaccheyya.
sn12.63:4.2: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, gavi niccamma kuttance nissaya tittheyya. Ye kuttanissita pana te nam khadeyyum.
sn12.63:4.3: Rukkhance nissaya tittheyya, ye rukkhanissita pana te nam khadeyyum.
sn12.63:4.4: Udakance nissaya tittheyya, ye udakanissita pana te nam khadeyyum.
sn12.63:4.5: Akasance nissaya tittheyya, ye akasanissita pana te nam khadeyyum.
sn12.63:4.6: Yam yadeva hi sa, bhikkhave, gavi niccamma nissaya tittheyya, ye tannissita pana te nam khadeyyum.
sn12.63:4.8: Phasse, bhikkhave, ahare parinnate tisso vedana parinnata honti.
sn12.63:4.9: Tisu vedanasu parinnatasu ariyasavakassa natthi kinci uttarikaraniyanti vadami.
sn12.63:5.2: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, angarakasu sadhikaporisa punna angaranam vitaccikanam vitadhumanam.
sn12.63:5.3: Atha puriso agaccheyya jivitukamo amaritukamo sukhakamo dukkhappatikulo.
sn12.63:5.4: Tamenam dve balavanto purisa nanabahasu gahetva tam angarakasum upakaddheyyum.
sn12.63:5.5: Atha kho, bhikkhave, tassa purisassa arakavassa cetana araka patthana araka panidhi.
sn12.63:5.8: ‘imancaham angarakasum papatissami, tatonidanam maranam va nigacchami maranamattam va dukkhan’ti.
sn12.63:5.10: Manosancetanaya, bhikkhave, ahare parinnate tisso tanha parinnata honti.
sn12.63:5.11: Tisu tanhasu parinnatasu ariyasavakassa natthi kinci uttarikaraniyanti vadami.
sn12.63:6.2: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, coram agucarim gahetva ranno dasseyyum:
sn12.63:6.3: ‘ayam te, deva, coro agucari, imassa yam icchasi tam dandam panehi’ti.
sn12.63:6.5: ‘gacchatha, bho, imam purisam pubbanhasamayam sattisatena hanatha’ti.
sn12.63:6.11: ‘gacchatha, bho, tam purisam majjhanhikasamayam sattisatena hanatha’ti.
sn12.63:6.17: ‘gacchatha, bho, tam purisam sayanhasamayam sattisatena hanatha’ti.
sn12.63:6.20: api nu so puriso divasam tihi sattisatehi hannamano tatonidanam dukkham domanassam patisamvediyetha”ti?
sn12.63:6.21: “Ekissapi, bhante, sattiya hannamano tatonidanam dukkham domanassam patisamvediyetha;
sn12.63:6.22: ko pana vado tihi sattisatehi hannamano”ti.
sn12.63:6.24: Vinnane, bhikkhave, ahare parinnate namarupam parinnatam hoti, namarupe parinnate ariyasavakassa natthi kinci uttarikaraniyanti vadami”ti.
